Comments_List: Having taken languages in the past, Professor Von Kunes found a way to make learning the Czech language fun, but I feel I learned more in this semester than I did learning another language for four years. I feel prepared for the next level and better prepared to take other languages in the future.
I got a chance to leave a language that is hard, yet very interesting
I learned the basics of reading, writing, and speaking Czech.
Studoval jsem mluvit cesky. Czech I introduces students to the fundamental grammar of the language, and establishes the foundations for reading, writing, and speaking a very complex language.

I loved this class for the reason that I was allowed to very efficiently begin to learn a new language of Czech. I learned the basics of the language very well and I am excited to build on those next semester.

I learned an incredible amount about the Czech language during this course. Having had no background in the language at all, I found it hard to understand at first but due to Professor Von Kunes' I was able to quickly learn what I needed to.
Learned how to read and write Czech
Czech is a very difficult language to learn. I struggled this summer in Prague, but with the help of Professor von Kunes, my Czech skills improved tremendously this semester.
Learned the basics of the Czech language.
I really learned about the czech language and culture as well as the skills necessary to learn a new language.
The main strength of this class was Professor's engagement with her students. We all have good relationships and have a great time in class.
It was taught very well and has expanded the languages I can speak.
The class was awesome because we worked at a pace that allowed me to learn a lot while still getting a full understanding of the language grammar.
The greatest strength of the course is the professor and the small class size

Czech is a very challenging language to learn and requires lots of patience and practice. I would have liked for the grammar lessons to have been organized a little differently, but overall the course was great.
This class is amazing to attend and be apart of as a whole.
The strengths of the course were the engaging discussion and enjoyable back and forth between students and Professor Von Kunes.
Of course, I already have.
Yes
I would absolutely recommend this course to anyone who wants to learn Czech.
Absolutely. I loved this course and think others will too.
I absolutely would. Professor Von Kunes is great and, although Czech is complicated, it is worth the effort.
Take this class - Professor von Kunes is an amazing professor!
Yes, Professor Von Kunes is the one of the nicest/caring instructors out there. The class is very engaging and a lot of fun, while learning a lot at the same time.
The professor as well as the language itself make you eager to show up each and every day.
Yes, i would recommend this course to another student. I not only learned a lot of Czech but I was able to do that with enjoyable discussion.
